column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " What 's this ? "
#Text=Lady on stage says : " Through all the long night , winter moon glows with bright love , sleet her silver tears . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Ahh , poetry . "
#Text=Sokka says : " I am so sorry .
#Text=Remarkable oaf .
#Text=" Sokka says : " They call me Sokka , that is in the Water Tribe .
#Text=I am not an oaf .
#Text=" Macmu - Ling says : " Tittering monkey , in the spring he climbs treetops , and thinks himself tall .
#Text=" Ladies says : " Oooooh !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You think you 're so smart , with your fancy little words , this is not so hard .
#Text=" Ladies says : " Oooooh !
#Text=" Macmu - Ling says : " Whole seasons are spent , mastering the form , the style , none calls it easy .
#Text=" Ladies says : " Oooooh !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I calls it easy .
#Text=Like I paddle my canoe , I 'll paddle yours too !
#Text=" Macmu - Ling says : " There 's nuts and there 's fruits .
#Text=In fall the clinging plum drops , always to be squashed .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Squish , squash , sling that slang .
#Text=I 'm always right back at ya , like my ... boomerang !
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's right , I 'm Sokka , it 's pronounced with an " okka " , young ladies , I rocked ya !
#Text=" Guard says : " Uh , that 's one too many syllables there , bub .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Poetry ... "
